thread.title: Suicide bomber targets police in Turkey's Gaziantep
thread.title_full: Suicide bomber targets police in Turkey's Gaziantep

title: Suicide bomber targets police in Turkey's Gaziantep
text:
News Police kill suicide bomber in Turkey's Gaziantep Local news reports say clashes erupt in front of city's police station, with suicide bomber shot dead during attack. 10 Jan 2017 13:46 GMT 
Turkish police have killed a would-be suicide bomber who tried to enter the main police station in the southeastern city of Gaziantep. 
Following Tuesday's attack, Mehmet Simsek, Turkey's deputy prime minister, said the potential suicide bomber was killed and another assailant was at large. 
Local television channels reported on Tuesday that a gun battle broke out in front of the building and that ambulances had been sent to the area. 
CNN Turk said ambulances were dispatched to the scene. Source: News agencies Tell us what you think
